text: @realDonaldTrump Shut the https://t.co/5vxdUKvN0X up idiot ! If one more person die due to Covid-19 at work, You gonna be unique reason of this death/s. We used to know you as idiot but you wanna show yourself as a killer as well. Even entire Economy is not more important just one person's life
